title: What is a browser?
variants: A program for displaying web pages
A system for managing web servers

title: Which protocol is used to transfer web pages?
Which HTML tag is used to create a link?
What is JavaScript?
variants: A programming language for interacting with the browser

title: What does CSS do?
variants: Defines the appearance of a web page

title: What is browser caching?
variants: Storing temporary data to speed up page loading

title: What is a cookie?
variants: A text file for storing user data on the device
A technology for exchanging data between servers

title: What is WebAssembly?
variants: A language for developing web servers
A technology for improving performance in browsers

title: Which browser supports the latest web standards?
What is HTTPS?
variants: A data transfer protocol with encryption
A protocol for sending email messages
